title: Black screen Of Death
body: After Champ select my screen goes black. i can hear the sounds of the game starting but my screen remains black. This only started happening after the patch this morning. Does anyone have any answers?

replies.body: It sounds like you've connected to the match, but a driver or hardware problem failed to render the game.  For your specific issue, I recommend going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  This should do the trick, but let me know if you have any questions.
